metadata.title: Fictional Nations and Trade Routes Database
metadata.description: Political entities and economic networks for science fiction starmap

terran_directorate.name: Terran Directorate
terran_directorate.description: The central human government based on Earth, maintaining strict control over core systems through economic and military dominance. Known for their efficient bureaucracy and advanced technology.
terran_directorate.military_strength: Primary Fleet Command, System Defense Forces, Orbital Stations
terran_directorate.economic_focus: Technology export, raw material import, administrative services
terran_directorate.diplomatic_stance: Hegemonistic, seeks to maintain control over human space

felgenland_union.name: Felgenland Union
felgenland_union.description: A prosperous trade federation controlling key rimward systems, known for their Eclipse Festivals and efficient trade networks. Maintains independence from Terran control through economic leverage.
felgenland_union.military_strength: Defensive Fleet, Trade Protection Squadrons, Merchant Marine
felgenland_union.economic_focus: Interstellar trade, luxury goods, resource processing
felgenland_union.diplomatic_stance: Hostile to Terran Directorate, seeks independence through economic alliances

protelani_republic.name: Protelani Republic
protelani_republic.description: Ultra-capitalist republic centered on Protelan moon, with Scandinavian-descended inhabitants averaging 2m tall due to 0.9g gravity. Known for the Joi Veil Festival celebrating eclipses and strong alliance with Felgenland Union.
protelani_republic.military_strength: Corporate Defense Fleet, Trade Protection Squadrons
protelani_republic.economic_focus: Rimward trade hub, resource extraction, corporate services
protelani_republic.diplomatic_stance: Allied with Felgenland Union, neutral toward Terran Directorate

dorsai_republic.name: Dorsai Republic
dorsai_republic.description: Elite military republic based on Fomalhaut system, training the galaxy's finest soldiers at the Citadel of Valoro. Inspired by Dorsai!'s Cletus Grahame and Starship Troopers' Mobile Infantry, they serve as rimward defense specialists.
dorsai_republic.military_strength: Elite Dorsai Corps, Mobile Infantry, Naval Defense Fleet, Orbital Platforms
dorsai_republic.economic_focus: Military services export, tactical training, defense contracts
dorsai_republic.diplomatic_stance: Allied with Felgenland Union and Protelani Republic, neutral toward Terran Directorate

terran_primary_routes.name: Earth-Lalande Trade Corridor
terran_primary_routes.description: Major industrial supply route connecting Earth's manufacturing to Lalande's mining operations

terran_primary_routes.name: Earth-Centauri Express
terran_primary_routes.description: Primary administrative route to Alpha Centauri, first human interstellar colony

terran_primary_routes.name: Earth-Wolf Research Link
terran_primary_routes.description: Secure route to Wolf 359 research stations and military installations

terran_primary_routes.name: Earth-Proxima Supply Chain
terran_primary_routes.description: Essential supply route to Proxima Centauri's frontier colonies

felgenland_routes.name: Holsten-Brandenburg Route
felgenland_routes.description: Main internal trade route within Felgenland Union territory

felgenland_routes.name: Holsten-Griefen Route
felgenland_routes.description: Resource extraction and trade route connecting to 55 Cancri system

felgenland_routes.name: Brandenburg-Tiefe Route
felgenland_routes.description: Frontier route to rimward territories and exploration zones

felgenland_routes.name: Griefen-Brandenburg Route
felgenland_routes.description: Secondary trade route connecting Griefen Tor's resources to Brandenburg's manufacturing

felgenland_routes.name: Griefen-Tiefe Route
felgenland_routes.description: Long-range supply route supporting frontier operations at Tiefe-Grenze Tor

felgenland_routes.name: Holsten-Tiefe Express
felgenland_routes.description: Primary administrative route from Union capital to frontier territories

protelani_routes.name: Protelan-Holsten Commercial Corridor
protelani_routes.description: Primary trade route established after Julia Svensdottir's marriage alliance, connecting Protelani corporate hub to Felgenland Union capital

protelani_routes.name: Protelan-Brandenburg Express
protelani_routes.description: Direct route to Brandenburg's manufacturing centers, key to Protelani resource extraction operations

dorsai_routes.name: Dorsai-Felgenland Military Alliance Route
dorsai_routes.description: Primary military alliance route connecting Dorsai training centers to Felgenland Union, established during the Union-Directorate War (2353-2356)

dorsai_routes.name: Dorsai-Protelan Defense Corridor
dorsai_routes.description: Defense contract route providing Dorsai military expertise to Protelani Republic corporate interests

inter_nation_routes.name: Protelan-Sol Rim Trade Corridor
inter_nation_routes.description: Primary rimward trade corridor connecting Protelani corporate hub to Terran core systems, essential for Protelan Republic's economy and neutral diplomatic relations with Earth

terran_core.name: Terran Core Economic Zone
terran_core.description: Heavily regulated core economic zone under direct Terran control

felgenland_trade_zone.name: Felgenland Free Trade Zone
felgenland_trade_zone.description: Low-regulation trade zone promoting commercial activity
